scenes.title: Landing Page
scenes.narration: The Desmos graphing calculator welcomes us with an inviting interface. Note the various calculator options across the top.

scenes.title: Calculator Tools
scenes.narration: Let's explore these calculator tools. Each one opens a new window with advanced features.

scenes.title: Graphing in Action
scenes.narration: Graphing is seamless. Enter equations and see them visualized instantly.

scenes.title: More Features
scenes.narration: We have more features to explore on the homepage, like the Expression List and options to Share, Undo, and Redo.

scenes.title: Custom Expressions
scenes.narration: You can create and delete custom expressions. Let's add and delete an expression here.

coverage: This demo showcases the Desmos Graphing Calculator's UI, highlighting its graphing capabilities, tool options, and expression management.
assumptions: Basic functionality and accessibility of the website are intact.
Users are familiar with the concept of online calculators.
risks: Some features might not load as expected due to internet connectivity.
Calculator functions are assumed to be working as intended.

segments.text: Welcome to Desmos, your online graphing calculator. The landing page offers quick access to various calculators.
Let's dive into the array of calculator tools. Each one is a click away and opens new windows with advanced math functionalities.
The graphing calculator is a beauty. Type in any equation and watch it come to life on the coordinate plane.
Desmos offers more. Check out these handy features for managing expressions and interacting with your graphs.
You have the power to customize. Add and delete expressions for a tailored experience. See? Easy!
